page.title: 01The W Outskirts of Dumfries
page.content: Pleasant area immediately outside Dumfries-conifer covered hills in the West (400-600ft) mixed farming on the slopes and lower ground in East with part of Dumfries and Galloway Golf Course in the N.E.Crossed by three roads the A75 Euroroute to Stranae, the A711 to Dalbettie and the unclassified Old Military Road to Castle Douglas. The Cargen water (sq1+2) along which fish arm has been set up joins Cargen Pow (sq 3,4,8).Crooks Pow flows through the Goldilea Estate (SQ10) Goldilea (1760) the biggest house in the block (now nursing home) has connections wth Burns the poet.Cargenbridge Village (sq8) provides homes for workers in Dumfries and vast ICI Meliner Plastic Complext dominates centre of this block.To this runs the only part of railway to Stranrace (paddy line). k .
